RelatedSentence: Tourism cabinet secretary Phyllis Kandie will visit china next week to woo more Chinese nationals to visit Kenya .
Tourism cabinet secretary Phyllis Kandie will visit china next week to woo more Chinese nationals to visit Kenya .
Tourism cabinet secretary Phyllis Kandie will visit china next week to woo more Chinese nationals to visit Kenya .
The visit follows travel advisories against Kenya by Britain , the US and two other countries that traditionally originate the bulk of foreign tourists .
It comes just a day after President Uhuru Kenyatta said the government will seek alternative tourists markets to mitigate the advisories ' effect .
